name: koa-rethinkdb
description: basic sample creating a realtime application with Koa and RethinkDB
author: Lau Thiam Kok

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_PATH=./server nodemon --exec babel-node --presets es2015 server/index.js
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=./server nodemon --exec babel-node --presets es2015 server/index.js
